website_summaries.verdict: An exceptionally powerful and thorough dust collector. Although highly expensive, it's the best available.
cons: The priciest item on our shortlist, this product is out of the reach of many consumers

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong With This
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Very easy to assemble and it's mobility is terrific. I'm working in a small garage and have to move things around a lot. This dust collector is incredibly easy to move around and works like a champ. The bag size is fine for most operations but will fill pretty fast when planing a bunch of boards. Good news is that it is easy to remove and put back. I looked a lot of different dust collectors by a number of different manufacturers and very glad that I chose this one. For my needs it was the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Albers

customer_reviews.title: A good machine-but LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY effective dust collector.I previously owned another brand; no comparison! I have used it now for six months and have encountered only one problem: It does not collect dust from the new Delta table saw I bought at the same time. The apparent reason is the intake of the dust collector. For some reason wood dust / shaving collect at the entry port to the collector. I don't know why as this does NOT happen when I attach the hose to my 15" planer or 8" jointer. Both machines are also Powermatic and create a LOT more dust and chips. Finally, do NOT let anyone tell you the machine is "quiet"! IT IS LOUD! Period!
customer_reviews.author: S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: An excellent dust collector
customer_reviews.text: An excellent dust collector. Works as well as advertised. I wish there had been an option for a three-way 4" port (it comes with a two-way plastic 4" port). I was able to order a metal 6" x 4" x 4" x 4" port from Grizzly. Now I'm set to collect dust and chips from planer, jointer and table saw with automated blast gates.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! worth every penny. I had a older jet model that had horrible suction and kept tripping the breaker. The powermatic has amazing suction, more HP, and love the remote start. It seems like it has a soft start that helps with preventing the breaker from tripping. Looks like the price went down since i bought it too.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works well and build quality was relatively good. A couple of the pieces of sheet metal ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and build quality was relatively good. A couple of the pieces of sheet metal were bent, but this did not affect assembly or performance. Overall, the quality is consistent with the other powermatic machines I own (6" jointer, band saw), which is very good, but not amazing. I have yet to find a woodworking machine i would consider "amazing" in quality, so for now powermatic is what I buy.
customer_reviews.author: JQB

customer_reviews.title: Lotsa Power
customer_reviews.text: hooked up to a 4x8 cnc, table saw, bench sander, chopsaw, plainer, jointer, and a hose for just a dust vac... works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good  suction
customer_reviews.text: Has enough power to do the job as intended by my nephew in his woodworking shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dust collector.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding dust capture from my lathe. Well built. Assembly is straightforward. A little loud, but I suspect most other brands are similar in this regard.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff V.

customer_reviews.title: Gary Reid
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my work shop. it made the clean up a lot easier. has good suction,works well with the various machines
customer_reviews.author: Gary Reid

customer_reviews.title: does the job well
customer_reviews.text: this dust collector does the job well and even comes with a remote which has proven to be a nice convenience.
customer_reviews.author: John Buoniconto

customer_reviews.title: Very poor wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for several years and it works fine, but I don't have any duct work so have to move it from machine to machine. In the last few months I have had two wheels fall off. Found one that worked well enough as a replacement but just today another went south on me. So in order to get a permanent solution I added a piece of baltic birch and four new good wheels. It is a very weak spot.
customer_reviews.author: Bette & Dennis

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE!!!! I've been a high school woodworking teacher, and these have been the biggest waste of money. Brand new, and they don't trap any of the fine dust we create. We breathe it in all day long. I've even sealed the upper bag with layers of duct tape, and still there is always a cloud of dust in the room that is visible from the hallway. STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.author: Steph K

product_meta.title: Powermatic PM1300TX-CK Dust Collector 1.75HP 1PH 115/230-Volt 2-Micron Canister Kit
product_meta.description:
Style:Dust CollectorWe see a future built on great brands, great products and great people. In every facet of our business we leverage the strengths of our global infrastructure to maximize the benefits of all three.

AMAZON.COM
Powermatic’s PM1300TX-CK dust collector has a 1.75-horsepower motor, a collection capacity of 10 cubic feet, and a sound rating of 75 to 90 decibels--and its exclusive TurboCone technology improves chip separation to prevent clogging of the filter and increases packing efficiency of the collector bag. The PM1300TX-CK provides a combination of power and simplicity that makes it both productive and easy to use.



PM1300TX-CK
Dust Collector
At a Glance: * Canister filter offers more than six times the filtering surface area of standard bags
 * Remote-controlled digital timer can be programmed for up to 99 minutes
 * Dual 4-inch dust ports for simultaneous collection from two machines
 * Dimensions: 37 inches by 29 inches by 72 inches (assembled); weighs 154 pounds
 * Five-year warranty




Powermatic’s PM1300TX-CK dust collector offers superior particle collection thanks to its exclusive TurboCone technology. View largerConvenience and Common Sense
Many of the design features of the PM1300TX-CK allow for straightforward and expedient use. The canister filter offers superior filtering surface area over standard bags, and the clear collector bags feature a large capacity--which means less downtime changing them (but when you do need to change them, a snap ring makes for rapid installation and removal). The all-metal duct improves rigidity and air flow, and the 12-inch-diameter impeller is powered by a 3-horsepower motor for peak performance. Plus, four heavy-duty casters make for easy mobility around the workshop.
About Powermatic
From a family-operated corn-milling operation in McMinnville, Tennessee, to today’s 400,000-square-foot facility in LaVergne, Tennessee, the evolution of Powermatic has echoed the success of American business ingenuity throughout the 20th century and into the new millennium. Founded in 1921, Powermatic is now a leader in general-purpose industrial woodworking machinery.

What's in the Box
One Powermatic PM1300TX-CK dust collector, 1.75HP 1PH 115/230-volt, 2-micron canister kit.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The PM1300 Dust Collector features the exclusive Turbo Cone, which improves chip separation to prevent clogging of the filter, and increases packing efficiency of the collector bag. The canister filter offers superior filtering surface area over standard bags, and captures 98 percent of 2-micron particles. A digital timer can be set for up to 99 minutes, and an infrared sensor allows remote control operation. The all-metal duct improves rigidity and air flow. The clear collector bags are large capacity, which means less down-time changing them. Four swivel casters and conveniently located handles allow for easy mobility.

See more
feature_bullets: Turbo Cone improves chip separation and collector bag packing efficiency
The cone eliminates premature filter clogging for sustained performance
Remote controlled digital timer can be programmed for up to 99 minutes
Canister filter offers over six times filtering surface area of standard bags
All metal duct construction for rigidity and improved air flow
